00024 template <class Base>
00025 class TSyncProcessorWrap: public Base
00026 {
00027 public:
00028        typedef Base BaseClass;
00029 
00030        TSyncProcessorWrap();
00031 
00032        // pseudo-reimplemented (iproc::IProcessor)
00033        virtual int GetProcessorState(const iprm::IParamsSet* paramsPtr) const;
00034        virtual bool AreParamsAccepted(
00035                             const iprm::IParamsSet* paramsPtr,
00036                             const istd::IPolymorphic* inputPtr,
00037                             const istd::IChangeable* outputPtr) const;

00039                             const iprm::IParamsSet* paramsPtr,

00041                             istd::IChangeable* outputPtr,

00044                                    int taskId = -1,

00046                                    bool killOnTimeout = true);

00048        virtual int GetReadyTask();

00050        virtual void InitProcessor(const iprm::IParamsSet* paramsPtr);
00051 
00052 private:
00053        typedef std::map<int, int> TaskToStateMap;
00054 
00055        TaskToStateMap m_taskToStateMap;
00056        int m_nextTaskId;

00071 template <class Base>
00072 int TSyncProcessorWrap<Base>::GetProcessorState(const iprm::IParamsSet* /*paramsPtr*/) const
00073 {
00074        return IProcessor::PS_READY;
00075 }

00087 
00088 template <class Base>
00089 int TSyncProcessorWrap<Base>::BeginTask(
00090                      const iprm::IParamsSet* paramsPtr,
00091                      const istd::IPolymorphic* inputPtr,
00092                      istd::IChangeable* outputPtr,
00093                      IProgressManager* progressManagerPtr)
00094 {
00095        int retVal = m_nextTaskId;
00096        m_taskToStateMap[retVal] = this->DoProcessing(paramsPtr, inputPtr, outputPtr, progressManagerPtr);
00097 
00098        m_nextTaskId = (m_nextTaskId + 1) & 0x7fff;
00099 
00100        return retVal;
00101 }
00102 
00103 
00104 template <class Base>
00105 int TSyncProcessorWrap<Base>::WaitTaskFinished(
00106                      int taskId,
00107                      double /*timeoutTime*/,
00108                      bool /*killOnTimeout*/)
00109 {
00110        int retVal = IProcessor::TS_NONE;
00111 
00112        if (taskId >= 0){
00113               TaskToStateMap::iterator foundIter = m_taskToStateMap.find(taskId);
00114               if (foundIter != m_taskToStateMap.end()){
00115                      retVal = foundIter->second;
00116 
00117                      m_taskToStateMap.erase(foundIter);
00118               }
00119        }
00120        else{
00121               for (         TaskToStateMap::const_iterator iter = m_taskToStateMap.begin();
00122                                    iter != m_taskToStateMap.end();
00123                                    ++iter){      // we are looking for worst status value. This values are sorted worst => bigger.
00124                      int taskState = iter->second;
00125                      if (taskState > retVal){
00126                             retVal = taskState;
00127                      }
00128               }
00129 
00130               m_taskToStateMap.clear();
00131        }
00132 
00133        return retVal;
00134 }
00135 
00136 
00137 template <class Base>
00138 void TSyncProcessorWrap<Base>::CancelTask(int taskId)
00139 {
00140        if (taskId >= 0){
00141               m_taskToStateMap.erase(taskId);
00142        }
00143        else{
00144               m_taskToStateMap.clear();
00145        }
00146 }
00147 
00148 
00149 template <class Base>
00150 int TSyncProcessorWrap<Base>::GetReadyTask()
00151 {
00152        if (!m_taskToStateMap.empty()){
00153               return m_taskToStateMap.begin()->first;
00154        }
00155        else{
00156               return -1;
00157        }
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 template <class Base>
00162 int TSyncProcessorWrap<Base>::GetTaskState(int taskId) const
00163 {
00164        int retVal = IProcessor::TS_NONE;
00165 
00166        if (taskId >= 0){
00167               TaskToStateMap::const_iterator foundIter = m_taskToStateMap.find(taskId);
00168               if (foundIter != m_taskToStateMap.end()){
00169                      retVal = foundIter->second;
00170               }
00171        }
00172        else{
00173               for (         TaskToStateMap::const_iterator iter = m_taskToStateMap.begin();
00174                                    iter != m_taskToStateMap.end();
00175                                    ++iter){      // we are looking for worst status value. This values are sorted worst => bigger.
00176                      int taskState = iter->second;
00177                      if (taskState > retVal){
00178                             retVal = taskState;
00179                      }
00180               }
00181        }
00182 
00183        return retVal;
00184 }
